content.raw:
Making the question a bit wiser, which is the name schema to follow to upload files from release.py to the s3 container?

Note that the release.py script usually know about: package_name (gazebo3, ign-transport, ...), version, package_alias (gazebo3-prerelease, ignition-transport, ...), OSRF bitbucket URL or ignitionrobotics bitbucket URL.
